course_description: This is the first half of the Elementary Korean language course. It is designed for those who have very limited or no prior knowledge of Korean language. Emphasis is placed on the fundamentals of listening, speaking, reading, and writing.
sections: Class Nbr: 3603, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:40-3:55p, Instructor: B. Choi, Status: Open
